author: Andrew J. Hawkins
title: Uber pledges 10 million free rides and deliveries for workers affected by COVID-19
description: Uber will provide free rides and food deliveries to health care workers, seniors, government employees, and others who are fighting the novel coronavirus. The company was already providing free trips for NHS workers in the UK.
content:
any organization, healthcare provider, or governmental entity is eligible
Photo by Horacio Villalobos#Corbis/Corbis via Getty Images
Uber is ramping up its response to the COVID-19 pandemic, pledging 10 million free rides and food deliveries for health care… [+2004 chars]
